Articles.Content:
So I just set up this page where the fans can supply their coolest pictures from Kerbal Space Program without the clutter of hundreds of pages in a "awesome images!" page here on the forums. Send in your favorite Kerbal Space Program pictures and you'll probably see it with a nice caption on the page. Be sure to supply some information so I know what to write.

Here's the link:

https://www.facebook.com/pages/Kerbal-Best/468728289827225

I'm personally looking forward to the nice pictures people will send in.
I've liked it and may send in some photos later seeing as I'm not at my computer right now.

I don't use facebook really much myself. I believe you can link images, so here is my upload page that I put my best to.

http://s529.photobucket.com/albums/dd332/KwKiller/Kerbal%20Space%20Command/
